name: Balance de Inventario por Técnico
query:
SELECT sle.posting_date, atec.parent as tecnico, sle.warehouse, sle.item_code, 
 
		ROUND( (SELECT slex.qty_after_transaction  from `tabStock Ledger Entry` slex  
			where slex.item_code = sle.item_code and slex.warehouse = sle.warehouse
			AND slex.is_cancelled = 0 and slex.posting_date >= '2023-04-30' ORDER BY slex.posting_date desc , slex.posting_time desc,slex.creation desc limit 1),2 ) 
		as cantidad, sle.stock_uom,
 (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(name SEPARATOR ', ') FROM `tabSerial No` where warehouse = sle.warehouse and item_code = sle.item_code) as serial_no, sle.voucher_no as ultima_transferencia ,
 (select se.modified_by from `tabStock Entry` se where se.name = sle.voucher_no ) as validado_por
FROM  `tabStock Ledger Entry` sle
inner join `tabAlmacenes de Tecnico` atec on sle.warehouse = atec.almacen
where
 sle.is_cancelled = 0  and sle.posting_date >= '2023-04-30'   and atec.parent = %(tecnico)s
group by sle.item_code, sle.warehouse, atec.parent
 ORDER BY sle.name desc,CONCAT(sle.posting_date, ' ', sle.posting_time) desc
